thing-type.label: Pingable Device
thing-type.description: A device that is detectable by ping/arping

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: The hostname of the device being detected

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: States how long to wait after a device state update before the next refresh shall occur (in ms)

parameter.name: retry
parameter.label: Retry
parameter.description: How many refresh interval cycles should a presence detection should take place, before the device is stated as offline

parameter.name: refreshIntervalWhenGone
parameter.label: Refresh Interval When Gone
parameter.description: States how long to wait after a device state update before the next refresh shall occur when the device is currently not detected (in ms). Defaults to -1 which uses the normal Refresh Interval value

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Timeout
parameter.description: States how long to wait for a response (in ms), before if a device is stated as offline
